CustomField.description: List of all eligible financiers for the discount config.
CustomField.formula: IF(Cash__c, "Cash", "") & IF(Cash__c && (EnFin__c || Everbright__c || Mosaic__c || Sunrun__c || Goodleap__c), ", ", "") & IF(EnFin__c, "Enfin", "") & IF(EnFin__c && (Everbright__c || Mosaic__c || Sunrun__c || Goodleap__c), ", ", "") & IF(Everbright__c, "Everbright", "") & IF(Everbright__c && (Mosaic__c || Sunrun__c || Goodleap__c), ", ", "") & IF(Mosaic__c, "Mosaic", "") & IF(Mosaic__c && (Sunrun__c || Goodleap__c), ", ", "") & IF(Sunrun__c, "Sunrun", "") & IF(Sunrun__c && Goodleap__c, ", ", "") & IF(Goodleap__c, "Goodleap", "")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: List of all eligible financiers for the discount config.
CustomField.label: Eligible Financiers
